definition:
1. (Zo√∂l.)  A genus of rodents, including the beaver. See Beaver. 2. Castoreum. See Castoreum. 3. A hat, esp. one made of beaver fur; a beaver. I have always been known for the jaunty manner in which I wear my castor. Sir W. Scott. 4. A heavy quality of broadcloth for overcoats.

See Caster, a small wheel.

the northernmost of the two bright stars in the constellation Gemini, the other being Pollux.

A variety of the mineral called petalite, from Elba.
